item.title: Bootstrap 5.3.0
Hugo Bootstrap Theme alpha
item.description: Hugo theme for a secure, blazing fast and SEO-ready static website, using Bootstrap 5. Hugo Bootstrap Theme removes unused css, prefetches links, and lazy loads images.
